channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 09:49 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 09:49 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#햔햟햨혰쒬혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 09:26 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.
